item.title: Matrix 718 Owner
item.dc:creator: @CPUsquad CPUsquad
item.description:
@CPUsquad wrote:

heatrn11:

Maybe it’s not suppose to be capitalized?

(facepalm) … it clearly says .equalsIgnoreCase… < —

OT: u cant just put “blah (space) blah”

it has to be “blah_blaH”

well gl anyway…

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718 Owner
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Savions Sw, post:1, topic:458093”]How do i make myself owner.

I changed in commands if savions sw does ´´admin´´ he gets admin rank, didnt worked, compiled, restarted source, didnt worked.

Do i need to do ::admin or what?

I went to search my file (savions sw) and found 2 files, savions sw.p

I cant read it and cant edit it.

So i went to player.java, but found nothing that help me.

If anyone could help?

case "admin": if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Savions Sw") || player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Savions Sw") || player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Legions Sw")) { player.setRights(2); player.getAppearence().generateAppearenceData(); } return true; [/quote]

Insert Facepalm

I would gladly help you, if this wasn’t your 20th(+) post in the help section in the past couple days, and also, ‘Savions Sw does admin’ makes no sense…

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718 Owner
item.dc:creator: @Savions_Sw Savions Sw
item.description:
@Savions_Sw wrote:

How do i make myself owner.

I changed in commands if savions sw does ´´admin´´ he gets admin rank, didnt worked, compiled, restarted source, didnt worked.

Do i need to do ::admin or what?

I went to search my file (savions sw) and found 2 files, savions sw.p

I cant read it and cant edit it.

So i went to player.java, but found nothing that help me.

If anyone could help?

case "admin": if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Savions Sw") || player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Savions Sw") || player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Legions Sw")) { player.setRights(2); player.getAppearence().generateAppearenceData(); } return true;
